meanings.definition: The art or technique of making maps or charts.
meanings.sent1: Cartography is essential for creating accurate maps of the world.
meanings.sent2: She studied cartography to learn how to draw detailed maps.
meanings.sent3: The cartography class was so fun, we ended up mapping out our entire neighborhood!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a cartography of memories, each map leading to a different moment in time.
meanings.sent5: The intricate cartography of the ancient city was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The practice of drawing or making maps.
meanings.sent1: Cartography requires precision and attention to detail.
meanings.sent2: The art of cartography has evolved over centuries.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his messy desk was a form of cartography, mapping out his chaotic work life.
meanings.sent4: In her mind, the cartography of emotions was a complex web of interconnected feelings.
meanings.sent5: The cartography of the fantasy world in the book was so vivid, it felt like a real place.
